title: Hit error meter scale
description: Must be a number between `0.5` and `5`.

title: Automatically scale the overlay with resolution (osu!(stable) only)
description: The in-game score meter's size varies between resolutions. This options allows you to resize the overlay automatically to always have the correct size regardless of the game resolution. If disabled, it will always have the same size (as if you're running at 1080p). ____________________________________________

title: Unstable Rate display style
options: Show both the prefix and the value
value: Show both the prefix and the value

title: Unstable Rate display font size (in pixels)
Unstable Rate display font name
description: The font must be installed on your system (except for `Roboto` as it's the default for the overlay).

title: Main tick height (in pixels)
description: Must be a number bigger or equal `6`.

title: Normalize the hit error meter's width
description: By default, the hit error meter changes its size depending on the OD. This setting allows you to make the hit error meter have the same size, regardless of the OD value (or CS in osu!catch). This is pretty much what osu!(lazer) does.

title: Show hit windows
description: The equivalent of this being toggled off can be seen in some VSRGs out there.

title: Show the hit error meter in osu!catch
description: By default, osu!catch uses the hit error array to store where the fruit landed on the catcher's plate relative to their center, which is not that useful for most people. This option is for anyone that wants to see the hit error meter in osu!catch anyway.

title: Hit error ticks height (in pixels)
description: The height of hit error ticks when their animation is complete. Must be a number bigger or equal `6`.

title: Hit error ticks width (in pixels)
description: Must be a number between `1` and `8`.

title: Hit error ticks appearance animation duration (in milliseconds)
description: The time it takes for the hit error tick to fully appear. Must be a positive number smaller or equal `5000` (5 seconds).

title: Hit error ticks disappearance style
options: Fade out and decrease the height

title: Hit error ticks disappearance animation duration (in milliseconds)
description: The time it takes for the hit error tick to fully disappear. Must be a positive number smaller or equal `10000` (10 seconds). ____________________________________________

title: Hide the in-game score meter (osu!(stable) only)
description: Useful for people who want to both see the in-game score meter and use the overlay somewhere else.       !!! IMPORTANT !!! If this is enabled, the overlay MUST BE at the exact bottom center of the screen.
